Name: The Saqqara List of Kings
Description: The Saqqara List of Kings provides the rulers of Egypt in chronological order along with cartouches giving their titles and eras. The list of 58 names was taken from the Saqqara tomb of an official called Turi, who lived during the reign of Ramesses the Second. The names are in reverse chronological order, starting with Ramesses the Second and ending with Menes. The list has been broken in places.
